name: A Chainsaw Lite
description:
The best chainsaw app on iPhone & iPad. Cut up materials and let off steam with this stress-buster app. Perfect for the aspiring lumberjack.

Real responsive simulation of a Chainsaw with Physics, Vibrations and Sparks.

Cut-ups include: Chainsaw Lite billboard poster, Plywood, Mona Lisa, and Brushed Steel and Door.
